message: or shouldn't that move out of the message, so we only can only get one _id ?
from the reponses I get it looks like each message within the messages of the response contains an _id.
The docs state:"Each response will contain an _id which you should use as the next request's cursor."
shall we take the last _id from the messages list.?

the last live.json _id should be passed to live.json?cursor=_id

last_id in the message list is for getting the next pages of a conversation, as only 100 messages will be returned per call.
ok, that's what I assumed and what I'm doing already.
